trans-unit.source: An activity that supports compensation of its child activities.
CompensableActivity allows a developer to specify a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> activity that defines a long-running task that performs their core business logic.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity는 개발자가 지정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>가 핵심 비즈니스 논리를 수행 하는 장기 실행 작업을 정의 하는 활동.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also allows the developer to optionally specify a compensation and confirmation activity to schedule appropriate business logic in the event of errors or successful completion of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 또한 개발자를가 필요에 따라 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> 성공적으로 완료 또는 오류 발생 시 적절 한 비즈니스 논리를 예약 하는 보정 및 확인 작업을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Compensation and confirmation of a CompensableActivity is invoked by using the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> returned by the CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity의 보정 및 확인 사용 하 여 호출 되는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>CompensableActivity에서 반환 된.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is an opaque, typed object returned as the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A> argument after successful completion of a CompensableActivity activity’s <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken><xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A>인수는 CompensableActivity 활동의 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> 성공적으로 완료 한 후</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowElement%601.Result%2A> 반환 된 형식화 된 불투명 개체</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activities to explicitly invoke confirmation and compensation of a CompensableActivity.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>및 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>CompensableActivity의 확인 및 보정을 명시적으로 호출 하는 활동.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>

trans-unit.source: CompensableActivity can be composed in a nested hierarchical fashion in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: CompensableActivity는 워크플로에 중첩 된 계층 구조로 구성 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Compensation Programming Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/29e5442c-1df7-401d-a6ca-746e617cbf9f).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 활동을 가져오거나 때 예약 되는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 활동을 예약 하는 경우는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref> 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 작업을 취소할 때 예약 되는 활동을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: CancellationHandler can be used to specify custom cancelation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: CancellationHandler는 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> 에 대 한 사용자 지정 취소 논리를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The activity that is scheduled when the activity is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 작업을 취소할 때 예약 되는 활동입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when compensation is performed on the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대해 보정을 수행할 때 예약 되는 활동을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: CompensationHandler can be used to specify custom compensation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: CompensationHandler는 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> 에 대 한 사용자 지정 보정 논리를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The activity that is scheduled when compensation is performed on the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 활동에 보정을 수행할 때 예약 되는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when confirmation is performed for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 확인을 수행할 때 예약 된 활동을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: ConfirmationHandler can be used to specify custom confirmation logic for the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.
trans-unit.target: ConfirmationHandler는 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity.Body%2A> 에 대 한 사용자 지정 확인 논리를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The activity that is scheduled when confirmation is performed for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 확인을 수행할 때 예약 된 활동 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>합니다.
